sub_title: Project Manager Electric Vehicle Interoperability | Improving the world, one charge at a time
summary:
Born in Finland but raised in Africa, I’m an enthusiastic team player with a good understanding of people from different parts of the world. As an outgoing, multilingual and culturally aware person, I enjoy creating a sense of unity in interpersonal situations with people from widely different backgrounds.

My strengths in English, Finnish, French and Spanish enable me to interact and communicate within these diverse backgrounds over a wide geographical area. 

With experience from supply chain, sourcing, analysis and process management, I have a broad understanding of business operations combined with an entrepreneurial mindset while also keeping the focus on catering to the customer’s needs.

education.degree_name: Diploma in "Leading the Way to Success in Latin America"

awards.title: International Understanding Award
awards.description: RFIS's top award presented for "Ability to bring differing people together into a sense of community thus furthering the cause of international understanding".

projects.title: Oasis Africa Bed and Breakfast
projects.description:
Managing the setting up of Oasis Africa BnB in Nairobi, Kenya.

This project consisted of converting an un-used existing premise into a fully functional normally operating Bed and Breakfast. It was run in close cooperation with the owners of the premise with the purpose of handing the managing of it back over once the business would be established and self sufficient.

Tasks involved focused heavily on business model planning, initial setting up of the rooms, creation of a strong online presence and the running of the venture for its first months of operation. 

This was managed until the business was running on its own two feet after which management was transferred back to its owners in May 2012.

Visit Oasis Africa Bed and Breakfast at https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/333208

courses.name: Funnel Method based Sales Development and Training

profile_positions.description: Leading electric vehicle charging interoperability on the Tesla Supercharging network across EMEA. This includes roaming, initiatives with industry partners, and opening the Supercharging network to all electric vehicles.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager EV interoperability

profile_positions.description:
Improving the handling and processing flow of order-related documentation and information between Tesla and B2B customers to secure scalability for the operation and cater for projected growth.

-Lead the centralising of in-field operations from 19 countries in EMEA to Amsterdam
-Collaborating with internal departments to develop just-in-time documentation
-Collaboration with internal IT teams for development of internal reporting and opertional management systems 
-Setting up Office 365 systems and processes for the new centralised team
-Creating/updating of reporting for running the team's daily operations
profile_positions.title: Project Lead Funding Team

profile_positions.description:
Reducing operational expenditure and increasing efficiency in services-related operations in the Amsterdam store by improving processes in existing working methods, specifically in Click & Collect, Home Delivery, Customer Services and Aftersales. 
 
-Using latest data and tools to build visual and interactive reports for making of strategical and operational decisions 
-Reduction in customer waiting times at the returns desk by optimizing staff scheduling at the relevant hours of the day 
-Better shopping experience for customers by identifying issues affecting stock shortages 
-Reduction in Aftersales quantities by better analysis of customer cases and creating actions to prevent identified issued 
-Engaging with key stakeholders to drive and commit to mutually beneficial interests in the midst of an exceptionally busy environment  
-Co-leading a task force to reduce and solve the impact of an unfortunate situation with a service provider  
-Creation and implementation of new ways of managing daily processes to improve efficiency 
-Responsible for the upgrading to the online version of Office 365 for the whole store. Leading and securing the change management process and training for over 450 colleagues. Cost saving by keeping number of extended versions to a minimum.
profile_positions.title: Project Leader Cost Prevention

profile_positions.description:
Securing a smooth and effortless payment experience for customers via market relevant payment methods by:  
 
-Collaborating with colleagues from global responsible for the latest solutions and updates  
-Aligning of multiple payment-related agendas by different departments at country headquarters  
-Close cooperation with stakeholders in the stores with working methods, technical help and the rolling out of latest updates for all the systems in place 
 
-Coordinating systems rollout updates across Finland 
-Testing of POS updates at Test Lab in Sweden 
-Country-level POS system support 
-Managing solution change requests, updates & training 
-Direct support with local/global vendor systems (tills, EFT, gift cards and other 3rd party solutions) 
-Development of a new KPI reporting tool for Country & Store Cashline Managers to follow-up on operations and compliance 
-Supporting with goal setting, reporting, policy & compliance  
-Regular engagement with local POS system partner to secure good relations for solving issues
profile_positions.title: Country Payments Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Supporting of the Espoo store to improve the gross margin of the restaurant unit of the business by investigating the operating routines & procedures. This let to more effective ways of working in a constantly changing market environment.  
 
By fully engaging and bringing the staff on-board in the investigation phase, all were eager to use the results obtained to implement key daily working-routines, leading to an improvement in the gross margin by 2%. These practices were then applied in the other stores in Finland.
profile_positions.title: Project Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Supporting all five stores in Finland with relevant financial and operational data at regular intervals for making  strategical and operational business decisions. 
 
-Updating of weekly and monthly reports for all stores in Finland   
-Updating of bi-monthly financial reporting from Finnish stores to global unit 
-Analysis and presentation of results to key stakeholders  
-Reviewing of results with key stakeholders for their operational decisions 
-Close cooperation with colleagues in the finance department for securing of necessary data for updating of reports 
-Creating business cases for determining the viability of new opportunities 
-Developing of a solid personal understanding of the financial cycle, monthly closing, the stores input and how these affect the reporting structure and cycle 
-Building of a personal understanding of analyses & follow-up tools from a wide range of systems & SQL databases
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Joining IKEA Finland at an exciting moment for the launching of a project to establish a centralized procurement department for all 5 stores in Finland.  
 
-Creation of RFP's for new purchases  
- Leading tendering processes and negotiating with suppliers 
- Re-negotiating existing contracts to improve the terms for IKEA 
-Identifying the most suitable suppliers and building long-term relationships with them 
-Drafting of contracts to secure IKEA's interests 
-Implementation of IKEA's new purchasing policies with suppliers 
-Supplier management (keeping supplier quantities to a manageable minimum) 
-140 000€ generated in savings for own category
profile_positions.title: Sourcing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the procurement and delivery of direct and indirect materials from suppliers to factories in France, Finland and Spain. 
 
- Co-ordinating the ordering and logistical aspects of packaging and raw materials for plants in Finland, France & Spain 
- Using English, Finnish, French and Spanish daily (to professional working capacity) to engage with colleagues and suppliers from around Europe 
- Problem solving to secure on-time deliveries in moments of challenges with supplier stock or logistics partner issues  
- Carried out the change management of new SAP R/3 best practices in the factories in France.  
- Reduced yearly spend by tendering for indirect purchases 
- Mentored recruits in their new duties during the transition phase of the Procurement Department to Kemira’s new Business Service Centre in Gdansk.
profile_positions.title: Procurement Officer

profile_positions.description:
Co-founding and setting up operations of Chaguagari.com - a vehicle buying-selling platform in Kenya. 
 
-Co-led the initial stages of start-up from business plan creation to first round of funding. 
-Partnering with a reputed company in the field for access to their online platform 
-Setting up the operations in Kenya 
-Engaging with multiple stakeholders on several levels 
-Setting up a small local team 
-Building a wide social media following by defining a clear strategy and executing it 
-Using the strong online presence to drive consumers towards the car dealers (the primary revenue stream) 
-Running daily operations 
-This was a massive learning for me in understanding the East African mentality and Business Culture. Both of which are very different to West Africa where I lived for much of my younger years. I took with me an understanding for how the EAC unites the Eastern African states economically yet keeps the cultural uniqueness in each.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder

profile_positions.description:
My responsibilities in this small family company covered business development, sales and managing of the daily operations.
 
Accomplishments

-Managed procurement of all direct & indirect materials 
-Led the supply chain process from production-planning to final delivery
-Led the crutch-rental service business unit to growth 
-Secured an additional client worth 100,000 EUR/yr 
-Led a team of two employees
-Custom-built an ERP in Excel to match the exact needs of the supply chain operation from order-to-delivery
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: Part of team organizing a Christmas collection of gifts for children in the capital-area in Helsinki, Finland. Over 10,000 gifts were collected. My involvement was in social media, graphic design and logistics.

Since finishing my studies in Cameroon at the age of 18, I've had a desire to contribute towards providing  the community where I grew up with more economical stability in life. Though Helsinki is far from Cameroon, I realised I could do something in Finland, with other like minded souls, for the African community in Finland and potentially those further as well. 

As chairman, the vision for the organisation was to hone the mission towards applying a greater focus around the economical empowerment of the diasporan community in Finland. A topic of significant concern in the community.  
 
The vision and mission statements were revised, and strategies for the future aligned accordingly. All activities based around the vision. Externally this was made visible by re-branding the visual identity of the organization, re-designing the website and all graphical materials. Internally, management was improved by introducing Google's G Suite for Non-profits, allowing for more efficient use of resources by having all tools and documents accessible on-the-go.  
 
To continue the tradition of enabling personal growth through new opportunities, the board would change slightly each year.  In addition to the organizing of events and activities, the role covered all the yearly and legal responsibilities of a chairman. 
 
www.thinkafrica.fi

- Volunteering in Think Africa Week 2014
- Co-organiser of Think Africa Week 2015 "Black Market" and "Fail Day" events
- Co-organising of other events
- Treasurer Jan 2015 - June 2016

Think Africa is a platform for the creation of new opportunities and networking, on Africa-related projects, ideas and entrepreneurship.

I currently act as an advisory member to the board and team initiated in 2018.
